full_text: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-G DATE: 08/05/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 811 813 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8:00-8:30 AM 810 811 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 411 412 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 12:30- 1:00 AM 837 859 8:30- 9:00 AM 841 842 4:30-5:00 PM 440 441 1:00-1:30 AM 112 113 9:00-9:30 AM 914 915 5:00 -5:30 PM 512 513 1:30-2:00 AM 142 143 9:30-10:00 AM 946 947 5:30-6:00 PM 740 741 2:00-2:30 AM 208 209 10:00-10:30 AM 1018 1019 6:00-6:30 PM 610 611 2:30-3:00 AM 241 242 10:30-11:00 AM 1054 1055 6:30-7:00 PM 640 641 3:00-3:30 AM 317 319 11:00-11:30 AM 1127 1128 7:00-7:30 PM 715 716 3:30-4:00 AM 339 340 11:30-12:00 AM 31 40 7:30-8:00 PM 741 742 4:00-4:30 AM 410 413 12:00-12:30 PM 32 33 8:00-8:30 PM 812 813 4:30-5:00 AM 436 437 12:30- 1:00 PM 532 533 8:30- 9:00 PM 842 843 5:00 -5:30 AM 513 515 1:00-1:30 PM 50 51 9:00-9:30 PM 918 919 5:30-6:00 AM 541 542 1:30-2:00 PM 50 51 9:30-10:00 PM 934 935 6:00-6:30 AM 605 606 2:00-2:30 PM 213 214 10:00-10:30 PM 1014 1015 6:30-7:00 AM 639 640 2:30-3:00 PM 736 737 10:30-11:00 PM 1040 1041 7:00-7:30 AM 708 709 3:00-3:30 PM 306 307 11:00-11:30 PM 1112 1113 7:30-8:00 AM 735 736 3:30-4:00 PM 340 341 11:30-12:00 PM 1141 1142 MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-G DATE: 08/05/2019
TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE
Various time stamps and numbers throughout the table

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten time stamps and numbers in the table. The document is a 30-minute check sheet for inmates in a special housing unit. The document has been redacted with (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) in several places.
